snippet.title: Excavatorrr - showcase
snippet.description:
This is a game I created during the Winter 2009. I was really happy with it, but unfortunately the rather awkward controls and uninviting looks caused the game to be kind of a failure, player-wise. Anyhoo, I spent a rather long time adding all kinds of neat little features, and I felt that it'd be cool to upload a video that showed them a bit, without the requirement of actually playing the game. Neat, eh? If you really want, do try the game out at www.hempuli.com !

This game was created using Multimedia Fusion 2 by Clickteam. The music you hear is made by Noby, also known as crocz on youtube.
